channel.title: Help - Scar SRL Mining routines not working
channel.description:
I pick my colors then try to play but it reads :
Line 44: [Error] (44:1): Unknown identifier 'MouseFlag' in script C:\Program Files\SCAR 2.03\includes\SRL\SRL\skill\Mining.scar Failed when compiling
Does anyone have any idea on what may fix this? Any help would be greatly appreciated thanks

item.title: Help - Scar SRL Mining routines not working
item.dc:creator: @bullzeye95 bullzeye
item.description:
@bullzeye95 wrote:

At the beginning you have to put in [scar]{.include srl/srl.scar}[/scar] Under the Program New;

Read full topic
item.source: Help - Scar SRL Mining routines not working

item.title: Help - Scar SRL Mining routines not working
item.description:
@1337 wrote:

Download and install the SRL include (look around the SRL section of the forums for a link to download SRL and how to install it)

Read full topic
item.source: Help - Scar SRL Mining routines not working
